content: Hi! How can I help you with your fitness journey today?
I'm having trouble with my running form. Any tips?
Certainly! Focus on keeping your shoulders relaxed, landing mid-foot, and maintaining a steady cadence around 170-180 steps per minute.
That sounds helpful. Should I be concerned about my pace?
Pace is important, but form comes first. Once your technique is solid, you can work on speed. Consistency in your training is key!
